Articles.Content: Please add a "toggle" option in the fuel cell commands that are bindable to action groups. I'm a dunce at modding or I'd do it myself, but it should be a fairly simple thing to add, yes? As it is I need to waste two action groups for activate/deactivate commands when a simple toggle would be much preferred.
Yes, this really needs to happen, such a waste of an action group. Toggles for starting/stopping the drill (it only has toggle for deploy/retract) and each mode for the ISRU would be nice too.
I'm not the greatest expert on the KSP API, but I bet I could make a mod for that, at least until Squad puts it in stock because it really should be.
How does the mod operate? For example with a LiquidFuel + Oxidiser mix?
It is nice to have it in mod, but I think this function should be implemented in the default game. So... : +1
